00114 static EGS_Float *__help1, *__help2, *__help3, *__help4;
00115 static EGS_I32 *__ihelp;
00116 static void __help_get_data(EGS_I32 *nbin,EGS_Float *emin, EGS_Float *emax,
00117                             EGS_Float *a, EGS_Float *b) {
00118     __ihelp = nbin; __help1 = emin; __help2 = emax; __help3 = a; __help4 = b;
00119 }
00120 
00121 static void __init_interpolator(int q, int imed, int type,
00122                                 EGS_Interpolator &i) {
00123     if( q ) egsGetElectronData(__help_get_data,&imed,&type);
00124     else egsGetPhotonData(__help_get_data,&imed,&type);
00125     i.initialize(*__ihelp,*__help1,*__help2,__help3,__help4);
00126 }

00129     EGS_Application::setAusgabCall(call,on_or_off);
00130     the_epcont->iausfl[call] = (int) on_or_off;

00133 static EGS_LOCAL void __egs_iovar(int nio, int ns,
00134         const char *source, char *var) {
00135     if( ns > nio-1 )
00136         egsFatal("Mortran variable is not long enough to hold %s\n",source);
00137     int j;
00138     for(j=0; j<ns; j++) var[j] = source[j];
00139     var[ns] = 0;
00140     for(j=ns+1; j<nio; j++) var[j] = ' ';
00141 }
00142 
00143 static EGS_LOCAL char __write_buf[8192];
00144 extern __extc__ void F77_OBJ_(egs_write_string,EGS_WRITE_STRING)(int *,
00145                                const char *,int);
00146 void EGS_LOCAL __write_to_fortran_file(const char *msg, ...) {
00147     va_list ap; va_start( ap, msg );
00148     vsprintf(__write_buf,msg,ap); va_end(ap);
00149     int ounit=the_egsio->i_log;
00150     F77_OBJ_(egs_write_string,EGS_WRITE_STRING)(&ounit,__write_buf,
00151              strlen(__write_buf));
00152 }
00153 void EGS_LOCAL __write_to_fortran_file_and_exit(const char *msg, ...) {
00154     va_list ap; va_start( ap, msg );
00155     vsprintf(__write_buf,msg,ap); va_end(ap);
00156     int ounit=the_egsio->i_log;
00157     F77_OBJ_(egs_write_string,EGS_WRITE_STRING)(&ounit,__write_buf,
00158              strlen(__write_buf));
00159     exit(1);
00160 }

00162 extern __extc__  void F77_OBJ_(egs_set_defaults,EGS_SET_DEFAULTS)();
00163 extern __extc__  void F77_OBJ_(egs_init1,EGS_INIT1)();
00164 int EGS_AdvancedApplication::initEGSnrcBackEnd() {
00165     F77_OBJ_(egs_set_defaults,EGS_SET_DEFAULTS)();
00166     __egs_iovar(64,app_name.size(),app_name.c_str(),the_egsio->user_code);
00167     __egs_iovar(128,hen_house.size(),hen_house.c_str(),the_egsio->hen_house);
00168     __egs_iovar(128,egs_home.size(),egs_home.c_str(),the_egsio->egs_home);
00169     __egs_iovar(256,input_file.size(),input_file.c_str(),the_egsio->input_file);
00170     __egs_iovar(256,final_output_file.size(),final_output_file.c_str(),
00171             the_egsio->output_file);
00172     __egs_iovar(256,pegs_file.size(),pegs_file.c_str(),the_egsio->pegs_file);
00173     the_egsio->i_parallel = i_parallel;
00174     the_egsio->n_parallel = n_parallel;
00175     the_egsio->is_pegsless = is_pegsless;
00176     if( run ) the_egsio->n_chunk = run->getNchunk();
00177     the_egsio->is_batch = (int) batch_run;
00178     F77_OBJ_(egs_init1,EGS_INIT1)();
00179     /*
00180     if( batch_run ) {
00181         egsSetInfoFunction(Information,__write_to_fortran_file);
00182         egsSetInfoFunction(Warning,__write_to_fortran_file);
00183         egsSetInfoFunction(Fatal,__write_to_fortran_file_and_exit);
00184     }
00185     */
00186     io_flag = 1;
00187     return 0;
00188 }

00190 /* The following 2 functions were used in an attempt to redirect
00191    all fortran I/O to use egsInformationn a degsWarning.
00192    Unfortunately, there were segmentation violations in the
00193    fortran I/O functions that I don't understand.
00194 
00195 extern __extc__  void F77_OBJ_(egs_info_output,EGS_INFO_OUTPUT)
00196     (char *msg, int len) {
00197     int j; for(j=len-1; j>=0; j--) if( !isspace(msg[j]) ) break;
00198     if( j<len-1 ) ++j;
00199     char c = msg[j]; msg[j] = 0;
00200     egsInformation("%s\n",msg);
00201     msg[j] = c;
00202 }
00203 
00204 extern __extc__  void F77_OBJ_(egs_warning_output,EGS_WARNING_OUTPUT)
00205     (char *msg, int len) {
00206     int j; for(j=len-1; j>=0; j--) if( !isspace(msg[j]) ) break;
00207     if( j<len-1 ) ++j;
00208     char c = msg[j]; msg[j] = 0;
00209     egsWarning("%s\n",msg);
00210     msg[j] = c;
00211 }
00212 */

00214 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN

00222 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_TransportProperty {
00223 
00224     string name;
00225     vector<string> options;
00226     vector<string> *str_v;
00227     vector<EGS_Float> *f_v;
00228     string     charinp;
00229     int        type;
00230     EGS_I32   *int_input;
00231     EGS_Float *float_input;
00232     int        len,nitem;
00233     char      *char_input;
00234 
00235 public:
00236 
00237     /* Integer input type = 0 */
00238     EGS_TransportProperty(const char *Name, EGS_I32 *val) :
00239         name(Name), type(0), int_input(val) {};
00240     /* Real input type = 1 */
00241     EGS_TransportProperty(const char *Name, EGS_Float *val) :
00242         name(Name), type(1), float_input(val) {};
00243     /* Character string input type = 3 */
00244     EGS_TransportProperty(const char *Name, int L, char *val) :
00245         name(Name), type(3), char_input(val), len(L) {};
00246     /* Character string array input type = 4 */
00247     EGS_TransportProperty(const char *Name,int L,int N,vector<string> *str):
00248         name(Name), type(4), str_v(str), len(L), nitem(N) {};
00249     /* Real array input type = 5 */
00250     EGS_TransportProperty(const char *Name,int N,vector<EGS_Float> *f):
00251         name(Name), type(5), f_v(f), nitem(N) {};
00252     /* Integer input with allowed values => type = 2 */
00253     void addOption(const char *opt) {
00254         options.push_back(opt); type = 2;
00255     };
00256     void getInput(EGS_Input *input) {
00257         if( type == 1 ) {
00258             EGS_Float aux; int err = input->getInput(name,aux);
00259             if( !err ) *float_input = aux;
00260         }
00261         else if( type == 0 ) {
00262             EGS_I32 aux; int err = input->getInput(name,aux);
00263             if( !err ) *int_input = aux;
00264         }
00265         else if( type == 3 ) {
00266             int err = input->getInput(name,charinp);
00267             if( !err ) {
00268                 int l = charinp.size(); if( l > len ) l = len; int j;
00269                 for(j=0; j<l; j++) char_input[j] = charinp[j];
00270                 for(j=l; j<len; j++) char_input[j] = ' ';
00271             }
00272             else{charinp = string(char_input).substr(0,len);}
00273         }
00274         else if( type == 4 ) {
00275             int err = input->getInput(name,*str_v);
00276             if( !err ) {
00277               vector<string> str = *str_v;str_v->clear();
00278               int number = str.size();
00279               if(number>nitem){
00280                 str.erase(str.begin()+nitem,str.end());number=nitem;
00281               }
00282               for(int i=0; i<number; i++){
00283                 if (str[i].size()>len) str[i] = str[i].substr(0,len);
00284               }
00285               *str_v = str;
00286             }
00287         }
00288         else if( type == 5 ) {
00289             int err = input->getInput(name,*f_v);
00290             if( !err ) {
00291               vector<EGS_Float> fv = *f_v;f_v->clear();
00292               int number = fv.size();
00293               if(number>nitem){
00294                 fv.erase(fv.begin()+nitem,fv.end());number=nitem;
00295               }
00296               *f_v = fv;
00297             }
00298         }
00299         else {
00300             bool is_ok; EGS_I32 iaux = input->getInput(name,options,0,&is_ok);
00301             if( is_ok ) *int_input = iaux;
00302             egsWarning("Property %s: %d\n",name.c_str(),*int_input);
00303         }
00304     };
00305     void info(int nc) {
00306         egsInformation("%s",name.c_str());
00307         for(int j=name.size(); j<nc; j++) egsInformation(" ");
00308         if( type == 0 ) egsInformation("%d\n",*int_input);
00309         else if( type == 1 ) egsInformation("%g\n",*float_input);
00310         else if( type == 3 ) egsInformation("%s\n",(string(char_input).substr(0,len)).c_str());
00311         else if( type == 5 ) {
00312             for (vector<EGS_Float>::iterator it = f_v->begin() ; it != f_v->end(); ++it)
00313                 egsInformation("%g ",*it);
00314                 egsInformation("\n");
00315         }
00316         else egsInformation("%s\n",options[*int_input].c_str());
00317     };
00318     int size() {
00319         if( type == 1 )      return sizeof(EGS_Float);
00320         else if( type == 3 ) return len;
00321         else if( type == 4 ) return nitem;
00322         else if( type == 5 ) return f_v->size();
00323         else                 return sizeof(EGS_I32);
00324     };
00325 
00326 };
00327 #endif

00341 int EGS_AdvancedApplication::initCrossSections() {
00342     egsWarning("In initCrossSections(): spin effects = %d\n",
00343        the_xoptions->spin_effects);
00344     EGS_Input *transportp = input->getInputItem("MC transport parameter");
00345     if( !transportp ) transportp = input->getInputItem("transport parameter");
00346     return helpInit(transportp,true);
00347 }

00349 extern "C" void F77_OBJ_(set_elastic_parameter,SET_ELASTIC_PARAMETER)();

00351 int EGS_AdvancedApplication::helpInit(EGS_Input *transportp, bool do_hatch) {
00352     if( !geometry ) {
00353         egsWarning("initCrossSections(): no geometry?\n"); return 1;
00354     }
00355     EGS_BaseGeometry::setActiveGeometryList(app_index);
00356     int nmed_new = EGS_BaseGeometry::nMedia(), j;
00357     if( nmed_new < 1 ) {
00358         egsWarning("initCrossSections(): no media in this geometry?\n");
00359         return 2;
00360     }
00361     int nmed_old = nmed; nmed = nmed_new;
00362     int *ind = new int [nmed];
00363     for(j=0; j<nmed; j++) {
00364         const char *medname = geometry->getMediumName(j);
00365         int len = strlen(medname); ind[j] = egsAddMedium(medname, len);
00366     }
00367 
00368     vector<string> ff_media, ff_names; string eii_xsect;
00369     vector<EGS_Float> efield_v, bfield_v;
00370     //
00371     // The Intel compiler uses -1 for .true. => all logical
00372     // variables don't work!
00373     // This is a fix for this
00374     //
00375     if( the_xoptions->spin_effects != 0 ) the_xoptions->spin_effects=1;
00376     //if( the_xoptions->exact_bca != 0 ) the_xoptions->exact_bca=1;
00377 
00378     //
00379     // See if there are transport parameters set in the input file.
00380     //
00381     EGS_TransportProperty efield("Electric Field",3,&efield_v);
00382     EGS_TransportProperty bfield("Magnetic Field",3,&bfield_v);
00383     EGS_TransportProperty estepem("EM ESTEPE",&the_emf->EMLMTIN);
00384     EGS_TransportProperty ecut("Global Ecut",&the_bounds->ecut);
00385     EGS_TransportProperty pcut("Global Pcut",&the_bounds->pcut);
00386     EGS_TransportProperty smax("Global Smax",&the_etcontrol->smaxir);
00387     EGS_TransportProperty estep("ESTEPE",&the_etcontrol->estepe);
00388     EGS_TransportProperty ximax("Ximax",&the_etcontrol->ximax);
00389     EGS_TransportProperty skind("Skin depth for BCA",
00390             &the_etcontrol->skindepth_for_bca);
00391     EGS_TransportProperty pxsec("Photon cross sections",16,the_media->pxsec);
00392     EGS_TransportProperty pxsec_out("Photon cross-sections output",&the_egsio->xsec_out);
00393     pxsec_out.addOption("Off"); pxsec_out.addOption("On");
00394     EGS_TransportProperty cxsec("Compton cross sections",16,the_media->compxsec);
00395     EGS_TransportProperty bc("Bound Compton scattering",&the_xoptions->ibcmp);
00396     bc.addOption("Off"); bc.addOption("On"); bc.addOption("Simple");
00397     bc.addOption("norej");
00398     EGS_TransportProperty radc("Radiative Compton corrections",
00399             &the_xoptions->radc_flag);
00400     radc.addOption("Off"); radc.addOption("On");
00401     /* Photonuclear input parameters */
00402     EGS_TransportProperty photonucxsec("Photonuclear cross sections",16,the_media->photonucxsec);
00403     EGS_TransportProperty photonuc("Photonuclear attenuation",&the_xoptions->iphotonuc);
00404     photonuc.addOption("Off"); photonuc.addOption("On");
00405 
00406     EGS_TransportProperty rayl("Rayleigh scattering",&the_xoptions->iraylr);
00407     rayl.addOption("Off"); rayl.addOption("On"); rayl.addOption("custom");
00408     EGS_TransportProperty ff_med("ff media names",24,MXMED,&ff_media);
00409     EGS_TransportProperty ff_files("ff file names",128,MXMED, &ff_names);
00410     EGS_TransportProperty relax("Atomic relaxations",&the_xoptions->iedgfl);
00411     relax.addOption("Off"); relax.addOption("On");
00412     EGS_TransportProperty iphter("Photoelectron angular sampling",
00413           &the_xoptions->iphter);
00414     iphter.addOption("Off"); iphter.addOption("On");
00415     EGS_TransportProperty spin("Spin effects",&the_xoptions->spin_effects);
00416     spin.addOption("Off"); spin.addOption("On");
00417     EGS_TransportProperty trip("Triplet production",&the_xoptions->itriplet);
00418     trip.addOption("Off"); trip.addOption("On");
00419     EGS_TransportProperty eii("Electron Impact Ionization",16,the_media->eiixsec);
00420     EGS_TransportProperty brem("Brems cross sections",&the_xoptions->ibr_nist);
00421     brem.addOption("BH"); brem.addOption("NIST"); brem.addOption("NRC");
00422     EGS_TransportProperty bang("Brems angular sampling",&the_xoptions->ibrdst);
00423     bang.addOption("Simple"); bang.addOption("KM");
00424     EGS_TransportProperty pair("Pair cross sections",&the_xoptions->pair_nrc);
00425     pair.addOption("BH"); pair.addOption("NRC");
00426     EGS_TransportProperty pang("Pair angular sampling",&the_xoptions->iprdst);
00427     pang.addOption("Off"); pang.addOption("Simple"); pang.addOption("KM");
00428     pang.addOption("Uniform"); pang.addOption("Blend");
00429     EGS_TransportProperty tran("Electron-step algorithm",
00430             &the_etcontrol->transport_algorithm);
00431     tran.addOption("EGSnrc"); tran.addOption("PRESTA-I");
00432     tran.addOption("PRESTA-II"); tran.addOption("default");
00433     EGS_TransportProperty bca("Boundary crossing algorithm",
00434             &the_etcontrol->bca_algorithm);
00435     bca.addOption("Exact"); bca.addOption("PRESTA-I");
00436 
00437     if( transportp ) {
00438         efield.getInput(transportp);
00439         bfield.getInput(transportp);
00440         estepem.getInput(transportp);
00441         ecut.getInput(transportp);
00442         pcut.getInput(transportp);
00443         smax.getInput(transportp);
00444         the_etcontrol->smax_new = the_etcontrol->smaxir;
00445         estep.getInput(transportp);
00446         ximax.getInput(transportp);
00447         skind.getInput(transportp);
00448         pxsec.getInput(transportp);
00449         pxsec_out.getInput(transportp);
00450         cxsec.getInput(transportp);
00451         photonucxsec.getInput(transportp);
00452         photonuc.getInput(transportp);
00453         bc.getInput(transportp);
00454         radc.getInput(transportp);
00455         rayl.getInput(transportp);
00456         if(the_xoptions->iraylr>1){
00457           ff_med.getInput(transportp);
00458           ff_files.getInput(transportp);
00459           setRayleighData(ff_media,ff_names);
00460         }
00461         relax.getInput(transportp);
00462         iphter.getInput(transportp);
00463         spin.getInput(transportp);
00464         trip.getInput(transportp);
00465         eii.getInput(transportp);setEIIData(eii.size());
00466         brem.getInput(transportp);
00467         bang.getInput(transportp);
00468         pair.getInput(transportp);
00469         pang.getInput(transportp);
00470         tran.getInput(transportp);
00471         if( the_etcontrol->transport_algorithm > 1 )
00472             the_etcontrol->transport_algorithm = 0;
00473         bca.getInput(transportp);
00474     }
00475 
00476     if( do_hatch ) {
00477 
00478         egsHatch();
00479         F77_OBJ_(set_elastic_parameter,SET_ELASTIC_PARAMETER)();
00480 
00481         the_bounds->ecut_new = the_bounds->ecut;
00482         the_bounds->pcut_new = the_bounds->pcut;
00483 
00484         if( nmed_old > 0 ) {
00485             delete [] i_ededx; delete [] i_pdedx; delete [] i_esig;
00486             delete [] i_psig; delete [] i_ebr1; delete [] i_pbr1;
00487             delete [] i_pbr2;
00488             delete [] i_gmfp; delete [] i_gbr1; delete [] i_gbr2;
00489             delete [] i_cohe;
00490         }
00491         if( nmed > 0 ) {
00492             i_ededx = new EGS_Interpolator [nmed];
00493             i_pdedx = new EGS_Interpolator [nmed];
00494             i_esig  = new EGS_Interpolator [nmed];
00495             i_psig  = new EGS_Interpolator [nmed];
00496             i_ebr1  = new EGS_Interpolator [nmed];
00497             i_pbr1  = new EGS_Interpolator [nmed];
00498             i_pbr2  = new EGS_Interpolator [nmed];
00499             i_gmfp  = new EGS_Interpolator [nmed];
00500             i_gbr1  = new EGS_Interpolator [nmed];
00501             i_gbr2  = new EGS_Interpolator [nmed];
00502             i_cohe  = new EGS_Interpolator [nmed];
00503             i_photonuc = new EGS_Interpolator [nmed];
00504             for(int imed=0; imed<nmed; imed++) {
00505                 int type; int imed1 = imed+1;
00506                 type = 3; __init_interpolator(1,imed1,type,i_ededx[imed]);
00507                 type = 4; __init_interpolator(1,imed1,type,i_pdedx[imed]);
00508                 type = 1; __init_interpolator(1,imed1,type,i_esig[imed]);
00509                 type = 2; __init_interpolator(1,imed1,type,i_psig[imed]);
00510                 type = 5; __init_interpolator(1,imed1,type,i_ebr1[imed]);
00511                 type = 6; __init_interpolator(1,imed1,type,i_pbr1[imed]);
00512                 type = 7; __init_interpolator(1,imed1,type,i_pbr2[imed]);
00513                 type = 1; __init_interpolator(0,imed1,type,i_gmfp[imed]);
00514                 type = 2; __init_interpolator(0,imed1,type,i_gbr1[imed]);
00515                 type = 3; __init_interpolator(0,imed1,type,i_gbr2[imed]);
00516                 type = 4; __init_interpolator(0,imed1,type,i_cohe[imed]);
00517                 type = 5; __init_interpolator(0,imed1,type,i_photonuc[imed]);
00518             }
00519         }
00520     }
00521 
00522     egsInformation("\n\nThe following media are defined:\n"
00523                        "================================\n\n");
00524     EGS_Float Emax = source ? source->getEmax() : 0;
00525     bool data_ok = true;
00526     for(j=0; j<nmed; j++) {
00527         int imed = ind[j]-1;
00528         egsInformation("%3d  %-24s AE=%7.4f AP=%7.4f %d\n",j,
00529             geometry->getMediumName(j),the_thresh->ae[imed],
00530             the_thresh->ap[imed],imed);
00531         if( Emax > the_thresh->ue[imed]-0.511 ||
00532             Emax > the_thresh->up[imed] ) {
00533             egsInformation("  upper limits (UE=%g UP=%g) not enough for "
00534                "maximum source energy (%g)\n",the_thresh->ue[imed],
00535                the_thresh->up[imed],Emax);
00536             data_ok = false;
00537         }
00538     }
00539     if( !data_ok ) { delete [] ind; return 3; }
00540 
00541     egsInformation("\n\nTransport parameter and cross section options:\n"
00542                        "==============================================\n");
00543     int nc = 50;
00544     if( !isspace(the_media->pxsec[0]) ) pxsec.info(nc);
00545     if( !isspace(the_media->compxsec[0]) ) cxsec.info(nc);
00546     pcut.info(nc); pair.info(nc); pang.info(nc); trip.info(nc);
00547     bc.info(nc); radc.info(nc); rayl.info(nc); relax.info(nc); iphter.info(nc);
00548     photonuc.info(nc);photonucxsec.info(nc);
00549     egsInformation("\n");
00550     ecut.info(nc); brem.info(nc); bang.info(nc); spin.info(nc);
00551     eii.info(nc); smax.info(nc); estep.info(nc); ximax.info(nc);
00552     bca.info(nc); skind.info(nc); tran.info(nc);
00553     if(efield.size()==3){
00554        efield.info(nc);
00555        the_emf->ExIN=efield_v[0];the_emf->EyIN=efield_v[1];the_emf->EzIN=efield_v[2];
00556     }
00557     if(bfield.size()==3){
00558        bfield.info(nc);
00559        the_emf->BxIN=bfield_v[0];the_emf->ByIN=bfield_v[1];the_emf->BzIN=bfield_v[2];
00560     }
00561     if(efield.size()==3 || bfield.size()==3) estepem.info(nc);
00562 
00563     egsInformation("==============================================\n\n");
00564 
00565     delete [] ind;
00566     return 0;
00567 }
00568 
00569 /**********************************************************************
00570    Set media and corresponding ff file names for custom Rayleigh data
00571 
00572    Since the_xoptions->iraylr is reset to 1 here, output will only
00573    indicate coherent scatter is on, but not whether custom input
00574    requested. Perhaps should make EGS check for iraylm(medium)>0
00575    instead of iraylm(medium)=1. The latter has been kept over
00576    the years for historic reasons.
00577                                                     EMH April 6th 2011
00578 **********************************************************************/
00579 void EGS_AdvancedApplication::setRayleighData(
00580              const vector<string> &str_medium,
00581              const vector<string> &str_file  )
00582 {
00583     the_xoptions->iraylr=1; int i,k;
00584     for(i=0;i<str_medium.size();i++){
00585        for(k=0;k<str_medium[i].size();k++) {
00586          the_rayleigh->ff_media[i][k]= str_medium[i][k];
00587        }
00588     }
00589     for(i=0;i<str_file.size();i++){
00590        for(k=0;k<str_file[i].size();k++) {
00591           the_rayleigh->ff_file[i][k]=str_file[i][k];
00592        }
00593     }
00594 }
00595 
00596 /**********************************************************************
00597    Set EII flag and xsection file name.
00598 
00599    The EII input is of a mixed type, i.e., one should be able to turn
00600    this option on/off, but there is also the possibility of using an
00601    arbitrary EII xsection compilation, including the available EII
00602    xsections with EGSnrc.
00603                                                     EMH April 6th 2011
00604 **********************************************************************/
00605 void EGS_AdvancedApplication::setEIIData(EGS_I32 len)
00606 {
00607     string str_eii,off,on; the_xoptions->eii_flag = 1;string ik="ik";
00608     for (int i=0; i<len; i++){
00609        str_eii += toupper(the_media->eiixsec[i]);
00610        off+=' '; on+=' ';
00611     }
00612     off[0]='O';off[1]='F';off[2]='F'; on[0]='O'; on[1]='N';
00613     if      (str_eii == off) the_xoptions->eii_flag = 0;
00614     else if (str_eii == on) strcpy(the_media->eiixsec,ik.c_str());
00615 }
00616 
00617 #ifdef GDEBUG
00618 #define MAX_STEP 100000
00619 EGS_Vector steps_x[MAX_STEP], steps_u[MAX_STEP];
00620 int steps_ireg[MAX_STEP], steps_inew[MAX_STEP];
00621 EGS_Float steps_ustepi[MAX_STEP], steps_ustepf[MAX_STEP];
00622 int steps_n = 0;
00623 #endif
00624 
00625 int EGS_AdvancedApplication::shower() {
00626     if( !p.wt ) return 0;
00627     the_stack->E[0] = (p.q) ? p.E + the_useful->rm : p.E;
00628     the_stack->x[0] = p.x.x; the_stack->y[0] = p.x.y; the_stack->z[0] = p.x.z;
00629     the_stack->u[0] = p.u.x; the_stack->v[0] = p.u.y; the_stack->w[0] = p.u.z;
00630     the_stack->dnear[0] = 0; the_stack->wt[0] = p.wt;
00631     the_stack->ir[0] = p.ir + 2; the_stack->iq[0] = p.q;
00632     the_stack->latch[0] = p.latch; the_stack->np = 1;
00633 #ifdef GDEBUG
00634     steps_n = 0;
00635 #endif
00636     egsShower();
00637     return 0;
00638 }
00639 
00640 void EGS_AdvancedApplication::finishRun() {
00641     egsFinish();
00642     //egsSetDefaultIOFunctions();
00643     io_flag = 0;
00644       // so that if extra output is being produced somewhere, it does not
00645       // go to fort.6 as it would without this as all fortran units are
00646       // closed after egsFinish().
00647 }
00648 
00649 int EGS_AdvancedApplication::finishSimulation() {
00650     int err = EGS_Application::finishSimulation();
00651     egsInformation("finishSimulation(%s) %d\n",app_name.c_str(),err);
00652     if( err <= 0 ) return err;
00653     //egsInformation("\n\n********** I'm last job! **********\n\n");
00654     //return 0;
00655     // if err is positive, this is the last job in a parallel run
00656     // => we have to combine the results
00657     // EGS_Application::finishSimulation() has already called
00658     // our finishRun() which has called egs_finish => all data has been
00659     // moved to the user code directory and the working directory has been
00660     // reset to be the user code directory. We must now reset the
00661     // output_file name and re-open units.
00662     output_file = final_output_file; the_egsio->i_parallel = 0;
00663     int flag = 0; egsOpenUnits(&flag);
00664     // The following is necessary because finishRun() was called from
00665     // EGS_Application::finishSimulation() and this resets I/O
00666     // to stdout and stderr. But if we are here, we are combining
00667     // the results of a parallel run and we want the output to go
00668     // into the combined run log file.
00669     //egsSetInfoFunction(Information,__write_to_fortran_file);
00670     //egsSetInfoFunction(Warning,__write_to_fortran_file);
00671     //egsSetInfoFunction(Fatal,__write_to_fortran_file_and_exit);
00672     io_flag = 1;
00673     final_job = true;
00674     describeUserCode(); describeSimulation();
00675     err = combineResults();
00676     if( err ) return err;
00677     run->finishSimulation();
00678     for(int j=0; j<a_objects_list.size(); ++j)
00679         a_objects_list[j]->reportResults();
00680     outputResults();
00681     finishRun();
00682     return 0;
00683 }
00684 
00685 int EGS_AdvancedApplication::outputData() {
00686     int err = EGS_Application::outputData();
00687     if( err ) return err;
00688     EGS_I32 np, ip; egsGetRNGPointers(&np,&ip);
00689     if( np < 1 ) return 11;
00690     if( np > 10000000 ) {
00691         egsWarning("EGS_AdvancedApplication::outputData(): egsGetRNGPointers"
00692               " returns a huge number? (%d)\n",np); return 12;
00693     }
00694     EGS_Float *array = new EGS_Float [np];
00695     egsGetRNGArray(array);
00696     (*data_out) << "  " << np << "  " << ip << endl;
00697     for(int j=0; j<np; j++) (*data_out) << array[j] << " ";
00698     (*data_out) << endl;
00699     double ch_steps, all_steps; egsGetSteps(&ch_steps,&all_steps);
00700     (*data_out) << ch_steps << "  " << all_steps << endl;
00701     delete [] array;
00702     return data_out->good() ? 0 : 13;
00703 }
00704 
00705 int EGS_AdvancedApplication::readData() {
00706     int err = EGS_Application::readData();
00707     if( err ) return err;
00708     int np, ip; (*data_in) >> np >> ip;
00709     if( np < 1 ) return 11;
00710     if( np > 10000000 ) {
00711         egsWarning("EGS_AdvancedApplication::readData(): got huge size "
00712              "for the mortran random array? (%d)\n",np); return 12;
00713     }
00714     EGS_Float *array = new EGS_Float [np];
00715     for(int j=0; j<np; j++) (*data_in) >> array[j];
00716     if( !data_in->good() ) return 13;
00717     egsSetRNGState(&ip,array);
00718     delete [] array;
00719     double ch_steps, all_steps;
00720     (*data_in) >> ch_steps >> all_steps;
00721     egsSetSteps(&ch_steps,&all_steps);
00722     return data_in->good() ? 0 : 13;
00723 }
00724 
00725 int EGS_AdvancedApplication::addState(istream &data) {
00726     int err = EGS_Application::addState(data);
00727     if( err ) return err;
00728     int np, ip; data >> np >> ip;
00729     if( np < 1 ) {
00730         egsWarning("Got np=%d\n",np);
00731         return 11;
00732     }
00733     if( np > 10000000 ) {
00734         egsWarning("EGS_AdvancedApplication::addState(): got huge size "
00735                 "for the mortran random array? (%d)\n",np); return 12;
00736     }
00737     EGS_Float *array = new EGS_Float [np];
00738     for(int j=0; j<np; j++) data >> array[j];
00739     if( !data.good() ) return 13;
00740     egsSetRNGState(&ip,array);
00741     delete [] array;
00742     double ch_steps, all_steps;
00743     data >> ch_steps >> all_steps;
00744     double ch_steps_old, all_steps_old;
00745     egsGetSteps(&ch_steps_old,&all_steps_old);
00746     ch_steps += ch_steps_old; all_steps += all_steps_old;
00747     egsSetSteps(&ch_steps,&all_steps);
00748     return data.good() ? 0 : 13;
00749 }
00750 
00751 void EGS_AdvancedApplication::resetCounter() {
00752     EGS_Application::resetCounter();
00753     double ch_steps = 0, all_steps = 0;
00754     egsSetSteps(&ch_steps,&all_steps);
00755 }
00756 
00757 EGS_I64 EGS_AdvancedApplication::randomNumbersUsed() const {
00758     EGS_I64 nused = EGS_Application::randomNumbersUsed();
00759     EGS_I32 np, ip;
00760     egsGetRNGPointers(&np,&ip);
00761     if( ip <= np ) nused -= (np+1-ip);
00762     return nused;
00763 }

00765 void EGS_AdvancedApplication::appInformation(const char *msg) {
00766     if( !msg ) return;
00767     if( !io_flag ) EGS_Application::appInformation(msg);
00768     else {
00769         int ounit = the_egsio->i_log;
00770         F77_OBJ_(egs_write_string,EGS_WRITE_STRING)(&ounit,msg,strlen(msg));
00771         checkDeviceFull(stdout);
00772     }
00773 }

00775 void EGS_AdvancedApplication::appWarning(const char *msg) {
00776     if( !msg ) return;
00777     if( !io_flag ) EGS_Application::appWarning(msg);
00778     else {
00779         int ounit = the_egsio->i_log;
00780         F77_OBJ_(egs_write_string,EGS_WRITE_STRING)(&ounit,msg,strlen(msg));
00781         checkDeviceFull(stdout);
00782     }
00783 }

00785 void EGS_AdvancedApplication::appFatal(const char *msg) {
00786     if( !io_flag ) EGS_Application::appFatal(msg);
00787     else {
00788         if( msg ) {
00789             int ounit = the_egsio->i_log;
00790             F77_OBJ_(egs_write_string,EGS_WRITE_STRING)(&ounit,msg,strlen(msg));
00791         }
00792         exit(1);
00793     }
00794 }

00799 void EGS_AdvancedApplication::startNewParticle() {
00800     if( geometry->hasRhoScaling() ) {
00801         int ireg = the_stack->ir[the_stack->np-1] - 2;
00802         EGS_Float rho = geometry->getRelativeRho(ireg);
00803         the_useful->rhor = rho; the_useful->rhor_new = rho;
00804     }
00805     else { the_useful->rhor = 1; the_useful->rhor_new = 1; }
00806 }
00807 
00808 void EGS_AdvancedApplication::enterNewRegion() {
00809     if( geometry->hasRhoScaling() ) {
00810         int ireg = the_epcont->irnew-2;
00811         if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00812             EGS_Float rho = geometry->getRelativeRho(ireg);
00813             the_useful->rhor_new = rho;
00814         }
00815     }
00816     else the_useful->rhor_new = 1;
00817 }
00818 
00819 void EGS_AdvancedApplication::saveRNGState() {
00820     rndm->saveState();
00821     int np,ip; egsGetRNGPointers(&np,&ip);
00822     if( n_rng_buffer > 0 ) {
00823         if( np != n_rng_buffer ) egsFatal("EGS_AdvancedApplication::saveRNGState:\n"
00824                 "  new buffer size (%d) is not the same as previous size(%d) ?\n",
00825                 np,n_rng_buffer);
00826     }
00827     else {
00828         rng_buffer = new EGS_Float [np]; n_rng_buffer = np;
00829     }
00830     i_rng_buffer = ip;
00831     egsGetRNGArray(rng_buffer);
00832 }
00833 
00834 void EGS_AdvancedApplication::resetRNGState() {
00835     rndm->resetState();
00836     if( n_rng_buffer > 0 ) egsSetRNGState(&i_rng_buffer,rng_buffer);
00837 }

00842 // Returns density for medium ind
00843 EGS_Float EGS_AdvancedApplication::getMediumRho(int ind){
00844   return the_media->rho[ind];
00845 }
00846 // Returns edep
00847 EGS_Float EGS_AdvancedApplication::getEdep(){
00848   return the_epcont->edep;
00849 }

00851 
00852 extern __extc__ void egsHowfar() {
00853     CHECK_GET_APPLICATION(app,"egsHowfar()");
00854     int np = the_stack->np-1; int ireg = the_stack->ir[np]-2;
00855     if( ireg < 0 || the_stack->wt[np] == 0 ) { the_epcont->idisc = 1; return; }
00856     int newmed; EGS_Float tsave = the_epcont->ustep;
00857     int inew = app->howfar(ireg,
00858             EGS_Vector(the_stack->x[np],the_stack->y[np],the_stack->z[np]),
00859             EGS_Vector(the_stack->u[np],the_stack->v[np],the_stack->w[np]),
00860             the_epcont->ustep,&newmed);
00861 #ifdef GDEBUG
00862     if( steps_n < MAX_STEP ) {
00863         steps_x[steps_n] =
00864             EGS_Vector(the_stack->x[np],the_stack->y[np],the_stack->z[np]);
00865         steps_u[steps_n] =
00866             EGS_Vector(the_stack->u[np],the_stack->v[np],the_stack->w[np]);
00867         steps_ireg[steps_n] = ireg; steps_inew[steps_n] = inew;
00868         steps_ustepi[steps_n] = tsave;
00869         steps_ustepf[steps_n++] = the_epcont->ustep;
00870     }
00871     if( the_epcont->ustep < -1e-4 ) {
00872         egsWarning("Negative step: %g\n",the_epcont->ustep);
00873         for(int j=0; j<steps_n; j++)
00874             egsWarning("%d x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g) ireg=%d inew=%d ustepi=%g"
00875                 " ustepf=%g\n",j,steps_x[j].x,steps_x[j].y,steps_x[j].z,
00876                 steps_u[j].x,steps_u[j].y,steps_u[j].z,
00877                 steps_ireg[j],steps_inew[j],steps_ustepi[j],
00878                 steps_ustepf[j]);
00879         exit(1);
00880     }
00881 #endif
00882     if( inew != ireg ) {
00883         the_epcont->irnew = inew+2; the_useful->medium_new = newmed+1;
00884         app->enterNewRegion();
00885         if( inew < 0 ) {
00886             the_epcont->idisc = -1; // i.e. discard after the step.
00887             the_useful->medium_new = 0;
00888         }
00889     }
00890 }
00891 
00892 extern __extc__ void egsHownear(EGS_Float *tperp) {
00893     CHECK_GET_APPLICATION(app,"egsHownear()");
00894     int np = the_stack->np-1; int ireg = the_stack->ir[np]-2;
00895     *tperp = app->hownear(ireg,EGS_Vector(the_stack->x[np],the_stack->y[np],
00896                 the_stack->z[np]));
00897 }
00898 
00899 extern __extc__ void egsFillRandomArray(const EGS_I32 *n, EGS_Float *rarray) {
00900     CHECK_GET_APPLICATION(app,"egsFillRandomArray()");
00901     app->fillRandomArray(*n,rarray);
00902 }

00904 //extern __extc__ int egsAusgab(const EGS_I32 *iarg) {
00905 //    CHECK_GET_APPLICATION(app,"egsAusgab()");
00906 //    return app->ausgab(*iarg);
00907 //}
00908 extern __extc__ void egsAusgab(EGS_I32 *iarg) {
00909     CHECK_GET_APPLICATION(app,"egsAusgab()");
00910     //*iarg = app->ausgab(*iarg);
00911     int np = the_stack->np-1;
00912     app->top_p.E = the_stack->E[np]; app->top_p.wt = the_stack->wt[np];
00913     app->top_p.x = EGS_Vector(the_stack->x[np],the_stack->y[np],the_stack->z[np]);
00914     app->top_p.u = EGS_Vector(the_stack->u[np],the_stack->v[np],the_stack->w[np]);
00915     app->top_p.q = the_stack->iq[np]; app->top_p.ir = the_stack->ir[np]-2;
00916     app->top_p.latch = the_stack->latch[np]; app->Np = the_stack->np-1;
00917     *iarg = app->userScoring(*iarg);
00918 }
00919 
00920 extern __extc__ void egsStartParticle() {
00921     CHECK_GET_APPLICATION(app,"egsStartParticle()");
00922     int np = the_stack->np - 1; int ir = the_stack->ir[np]-2;
00923     if( ir < 0 ) { the_epcont->idisc = 1; return; }
00924     the_epcont->idisc = 0;
00925     the_useful->medium = app->getMedium(ir)+1;
00926     //egsInformation("start particle: ir=%d medium=%d\n",ir,the_useful->medium);
00927     app->startNewParticle();
00928 }
